preqs: A gateway unit in Theatre or a first year sequence in Performance or by permission

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS1287, ATS1288} or  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1351, ATS1352})

description: This unit will introduce students to skills and concepts in writing for performance independently and in a collaborative workshop environment, culminating in performance work based on the completed script. The program will introduce students to the key stages of developing a script for the stage and will also engage with key industry concerns in the field of script writing.
